messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] what this list is was: intro/concerns
messages.msgSnippet:
Angela, I have never ever heard anyone here say that on this list, ever... though I
believe that it is expected that you come here with an open mind and heart
messages.messageBody:
Angela,

I have never ever heard anyone here say that on this list, ever... though I
believe that it is expected that you come here with an open mind and heart
to begin to release coercive control over our children and begin to respect
and trust them as equal human beings (who need guidance, not to be
controlled).

What is not welcome is discussion about curriculum (obviously).


~*~*~
Lesa M.
LIFE Academy
http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net/
-------Original Message-------

From: chotiius
Date: 04/10/06 22:16:31
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Intro/concerns (LONG!)

I would not find it encouraging
to be told "You're not X or Y enough for this list."

I am genuinely bewildered, which may make me come across
belligerent. Would somebody help me out?

--angela, mom of 4, all at home since 1997

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
